      builds subcolumns of type "Actual Commitments / Disbursements / etc" and adds them to newcol returns true iff the function has created, without the report having required it, a "Total Actual Commitments" column
      protected void buildTotalActualCommitmentsSubcolumn(GroupColumn newcol, boolean removeActualCommitmentsSubcolumn)
      calculates the "Total Actual Commitments" (a computed measure) field of the report and removes the "Total Costs / Actual Commitments" subcolumn iff it was not requested in the report (it is ALWAYS calculated in order to be able to calculate this field in this function)
      protected TotalComputedMeasureColumn buildTotalComputedMeasure(AmpMeasures m, AmountCellColumn funding, java.util.List<TotalComputedAmountColumn> mtefCols)

    • Method Detail

      • getColumnSubCategories

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getColumnSubCategories(java.lang.String columnName)
        returns categories for a given column. If the column has no categories, the returned list will hold 0 elements. this method uses the reportMetadata object (AmpReport type) to compile the needed categories for the given report
        Specified by:
        getColumnSubCategories in class ReportGenerator
        Parameters:
        columnName - the name of the column for which the categories are being requested
        Returns:
        the list of categories

      • generateExtractableAndGeneratedColumns

        protected java.util.List<AmpReportColumn> generateExtractableAndGeneratedColumns()
        fills extractable, returns list of generatedColumns divides the column set into those that can be extracted (extractorView!=null) and those that are to be generated

      • retrieveData

        protected void retrieveData()
        retrieves columns from the database. Only the columns that are specified in the reportMetadata are going to be retrieved. Each column is retrieved separately. Some columns need to be generated after the other cols are retrieved.
        Specified by:
        retrieveData in class ReportGenerator

      • buildTotalActualCommitmentsSubcolumn

        protected void buildTotalActualCommitmentsSubcolumn(GroupColumn newcol,
                                                    boolean removeActualCommitmentsSubcolumn)
        calculates the "Total Actual Commitments" (a computed measure) field of the report and removes the "Total Costs / Actual Commitments" subcolumn iff it was not requested in the report (it is ALWAYS calculated in order to be able to calculate this field in this function)
        Parameters:
        newcol - - the "Total Costs" GroupColumn which is being created
        removeActualCommitmentsSubcolumn -

      • createTotals

        protected void createTotals()
        generating the total columns of the report. createTotals is invoked after the data has been retrieved and is the first substep of processing.

      • removeUnusedRealDisbursementsFlowsFromReport

        protected void removeUnusedRealDisbursementsFlowsFromReport(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> fundingOrgHiers)
        if has Real Disbursements column AND has a hierarchy by one of ArConstants.COLUMN_ROLE_CODES.keys(), then remove all columns which are not "v temu" from: 1) Funding -> YEAR -> Real Disbursements -> XYZ 2) Total Costs -> Real Disbursements -> XYZ
        Parameters:
        fundingOrgHiers - CategAmountCell.filter(Cell, Set)

        given at the input a Real Disbursements GroupColumn and a list of legal subcolumns, removes all the subcolumns which have a different name
        Parameters:

        allLegalFlows -
